channel.title: MACHINE MADE PHD
channel.description: A blog about my journey to become a data scientist

item.title: Exploring the Pokemon dataset with pandas and seaborn
item.dc:creator: Redwan Huq
item.description:
The Pokemon dataset is a complete listing of all Pokemon species as of mid-2016, containing data about their type and statistics. Considering how diverse Pokemon are, it's worthwhile analyzing this datset to identify any insights regarding the design of new Pokemon, how the game is balanced and to potentially assist players in selecting the best Pokemon, if there exists one. And having been a fervent Pokemon fan as a kid, I'm also dreadfully curious!

Read more… (26 min remaining to read)

item.title: What exactly is data science?
item.dc:creator: Redwan Huq
item.description:
I figured I'd focus my first post on a broad topic and what better way than to discuss what this blog will revolve around: data science! Actually, when I talk to people about data science, I usually get blank stares, maybe a head nod or two, and if I'm lucky, someone will ask "is that related to big data?". Because data science is such an emerging field, practically everyone has their own definition, so allow me to share mine.

Read more… (4 min remaining to read)
